backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing product and cart management with functions to add/retrieve products, manage cart items, and includes blob storage mixin for image handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of hero carousel, product listing, product detail, shopping cart pages, and vanguardist design aesthetic with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Vanguard fashion e-commerce application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for the design system, including custom brand color #a932bd.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vanguard Fashion application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, product detail, and cart pages wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item component displaying product image, details, size/color, quantity controls with increment/decrement, price calculation, and remove button.
frontend/src/components/HeroCarousel.tsx: Fullscreen auto-playing carousel with three hero slides featuring images, titles, subtitles, navigation arrows, dot indicators, and smooth fade transitions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header navigation, Vanguard logo, menu links, cart icon with item count badge, mobile menu toggle, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A clickable card component that displays a product with image, name, and price, navigating to the product detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductGallery.t: An image gallery component with thumbnail navigation that displays product images with a selected main view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: A React hook providing cart operations (add, update, remove) and state management using a localStorage-based user ID and backend actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React hooks for fetching all products or a single product by ID using TanStack Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors using a purple/magenta color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with quantity controls, remove functionality, and order summary with total calculation.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage featuring a hero carousel, brand messaging about empowering transwomen through fashion, and three feature cards highlighting design philosophy.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page component that displays product information, image gallery, size/color selectors, and add-to-cart functionality with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListing.tsx: Product listing page component that displays all products in a responsive grid layout with loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, font families, border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting an e-commerce fashion store for transwomen with brand color #a932bd, listing completed features (carousel, product pages, cart) and architectural notes.
